contentencoded:
Less people filed for unemployment over the last week. But layoff announcements went up.

More and more fans are opting to stay at home and engage with fantasy football, and that makes some team owners worry about their bottom lines.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, September 5, 2013
teaser: Fans are obsessed with fantasy football--and that has the NFL worried. And a preview of Friday's jobs report.

title: PODCAST: The football may be fantasy, but the money is real
